A reflexive pronoun is used when the one who receives the action is also the subject.
Taking a selfie means taking a photo of oneself.
I'm taking a picture of myself.
Ellen, are you taking a photo of yourself?
She is taking a snapshot of herself.
He is taking a photograph of himself.
The goat is looking at itself.
We are taking a picture of ourselves.
The couple is taking a photo of themselves.
